the compound The FBI agents then added onto the front of it 8 to 10 seconds in which David Koresh agrees upon the broadcast of this tape to come out peacefully with all persons inside And then theres a 4 second pause And then we get into the body of the 58 minute tape that was sent out to the FBI agents And Charlie I guess if youll just tell me the the what the time looks like and and when its time to roll the tape well be ready to go
